extendedInfo.description: Are  you  looking  for  that  extra  edge?  This  10  minute  soundtrack  can  help  you  achieve  "Peak  Performance",  the  next  level  of  personal  excellence. By    targeting    a    mid-alpha    brainwave    frequency,    the    listener    can    get    into    the    perfect    "zone"    for    calm,    sharp    focus.    In    addition,    this    track    keeps    a    consistent    rhythm,    guiding    you    forward    towards    your    purpose.    This    track    has    been    specifically    designed    to    assist    the    listener    in    preparing    for    peak    performance    in    any    sport,    competition,    or    work-related    situation    where    you    want    "The    Edge".    While    listening    to    this    10    minute    "Charge    Up"    soundtrack    just    before    performing    right    before    a    game,    you    get    the    chance    to    mentally    rehearse    your    strategy,    seeing    yourself    executing    the    actions    perfectly.    This    is    the    very    technique    that    pros    like    Tiger    Woods    use    before    a    game!    It's    time    to    get    the    edge    and    push    toward    excellence!    This    track    utilizes    PsimatiXâ¢    proprietary    audio    technology.    This app streams via 3G or wifi connection. Leigh    Spusta    is    a    behavioral    scientist,    hypnotherapist,    and    Certified    Therapeutic    Imagery    Facilitator    specializing    in    the    use    of    sound    frequencies    to    produce    deep,    relaxing    trance    states.    He    has    worked    with    several    therapists    in    Los    Angeles,    producing    a    variety    of    therapeutic    audio    cds.    Leigh    combines    his    talents    as    a    musician    and    his    knowledge    of    hypnosis    and    related    states,    in    an    effort    to    pioneer    new    approaches    in    creating    rich,    resonant    sound-scapes    for    greater    efficacy    in    healing    and    meditative    products.    Leigh    is    the    developer    of    the    proprietary    PsimatiXâ¢    therapeutic    approaches    and    technologies.    Brainwave  Entrainment  /  Binaural  Beats  /  Isochronic  Tones  /  Monaural  Beats  /  Vibro-acoustics  /  Hemispheric  Synchronization  /  Alpha  State  /  Theta  State  /  Delta  State  /  Relaxation  /  Hypnosis  /  Hypnotic  Music  /  Meditation  /  Stress  Reduction  /  Tension  Release  /  Chakra  Alignment  -  Attunement  -  Balancing  /  Harmony  /  Schumann  Resonance  /  Frequency  /  Mind  Audio  /  Trance  /  Healing  /  Therapy  /  sports  /  performance  /  peak  /  edge  /  competition  /  zone  /  game
